description: The one-time legacy migration script (REQ-OPER-IMP-002) fails during production cutover due to unforeseen data mapping complexities, potentially causing data loss and project delays.
mitigation_strategy: Perform multiple migration dry-runs in staging using a full production data snapshot. Develop a post-migration validation tool.
contingency_plan: Keep legacy system read-only for 30 days post-migration. Use rollback plan (REQ-OPER-IMP-004) if critical failures are found.
monitoring_trigger: Post-migration validation tool reports a data mismatch rate > 0.1%.

description: A malicious script escapes the Jint sandbox (REQ-SEC-DTR-001) due to a flaw in the Jint library or a misconfiguration, leading to unauthorized CLR access and a major security breach.
mitigation_strategy: Conduct formal security code review of the Jint integration. Develop a suite of 'malicious' scripts for the permanent CI/CD test suite. Monitor Jint security advisories.
contingency_plan: Immediately disable the entire Data Transformation feature using the system-wide feature flag (REQ-OPER-IMP-001) until a patch is deployed.
monitoring_trigger: Security audit log shows an attempt to access a forbidden CLR type.

description: Team lacks specialized expertise in WCAG 2.1 Level AA, leading to an implementation that fails manual testing with assistive technologies, resulting in a non-compliant product.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate budget for an external accessibility audit. Provide targeted training for the frontend team and mandate manual testing with screen readers in the Definition of Done for all UI stories.
contingency_plan: Create a dedicated 'Accessibility Debt' backlog and prioritize fixing critical issues before release. Be transparent about known issues in release notes.
monitoring_trigger: Initial E2E tests with screen reader software reveal significant usability issues.
resolution_timeline: 4 weeks for training and initial audit
